name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Create Pictures with Wood Pieces
name_original: Jigsaw Puzzle: Create Pictures with Wood Pieces
description:
Jigsaw Puzzle is here! Now on your android device as a free game! Are you ready to start a puzzle and complete the pictures? Jigsaw Puzzle is the perfect match for any puzzle lover, we guarantee you'll fall in love with this game fast! Open the first book, pick one of the pictures, and start having fun with the classic wood puzzle! Let Jigsaw amaze you!

Enjoy the largest, most beautiful collection of puzzles in the world, and play FREE jigsaw puzzles every day! Each photo and difficulty are different. You can start with easy puzzles of 100-piece and, step by step, achieve glory in a fun puzzle of 1,024 pieces! Are you ready to create a masterpiece?

This kind of game is good for memory, brain training, and anti-stress. It is not as easy as a pixel coloring book and color by numbers, or as difficult as a chess game. Jigsaw Puzzle is the perfect difficulty level to increase your memory without increasing your stress level. Have fun and create pictures piece by piece. Different themes are available from animals, real photos, or 3D pictures to landscape and portrait.

Don’t let the imitation jigsaw apps fool you. Jigsaw Puzzle is the only app made by the jigsaw puzzle experts! Sorting your pieces, moving your pieces around on the board, filling in the edges – it feels just like the real thing! Only now you can take the puzzle with you anywhere you go! We hand-pick every image to ensure the highest level of quality. Check out some of our favorite puzzle packs, like World of Color, Americana Summer, and British Life. We're constantly creating new puzzles that we know you will love!

Jigsaw Puzzle is great for puzzle enthusiasts everywhere! Just pick your number of puzzle pieces and play. It's that simple!

CHOOSE THE NUMBER OF PIECES FOR YOUR GAME

• 4 to 1,024 piece puzzles (Tablet). Different games with different numbers of pieces.
• 4 to 400 piece puzzles (Phone). A lower number of pieces to adapt the game to your android device.

FEATURES

• Over 20,000 beautiful, high quality images! A magical experience!
• A new FREE puzzle every day! A different brain game each day!
• FREE downloadable Puzzle Packs. A maze of diversion on each page!
• New Puzzle Packs released each week. Enjoy the puzzle art!
• Earn rewards by completing each block puzzle!
• Use the Jigsaw Credits that you earn to get new Puzzle Packs!
• Puzzles from your favorite jigsaw artists. A different board game!
• Turn your personal photos into your own custom puzzles!
• Play on your phone or tablet. Relax your brain everywhere.
• Play large puzzles and switch different pieces!
• Music soundtracks and references to arcade games.
• Scatter pieces on the puzzle area.
• Rotate pieces for a greater challenge.
• Randomized pieces -- no two puzzles are the same.
• Work on more than one puzzle at a time. Relaxing yourself!
• Saves every puzzle you've ever solved. Everybody can play this calming game.
• Share completed puzzles with your friends. Try it! It's the best game in the brain teaser games universe.
• Game Center leader boards - Compete with your friends!
• 40+ different objectives to unlock.

Check back often to see all of the new puzzles we've added!
